mapper.select: select * from (select r.sitter_id, s.profile_picname, m.member_nickname, s.profile_content, count(r.sitter_id) as count, nvl(avg(r.review_star), 0) as profile_star from member m, reservation r, sitter_profile s where m.member_id = r.sitter_id and m.member_id = s.member_id group by r.sitter_id, s.profile_picname, m.member_nickname, s.profile_content, profile_star order by count desc) where rownum < 4
select avg(price_small) as small_Price_AVG , avg(price_medium) as medium_Price_AVG , avg(price_large) as large_Price_AVG from sitter_profile
